explains: adj. 粗暴的；粗哑的；脾气坏的
vt. 粗鲁地说；生硬地说
vi. 粗鲁地说；生硬地说话

sentences.en: "Now, the VERY next time this happens," said a gruff and suspicious voice, "I shall be exceedingly angry."
sentences.cn: “嗨，如果再发生这种事，”一个粗哑而带着猜疑的声音说，“我会非常生气的。”

sentences.en: He could be gruff and monosyllabic.
sentences.cn: 他说话难听，且少言寡语。

sentences.en: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentences.cn: 他不友好的外表下藏着一颗最善良的心。
